content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences and emotions, but here is an explanation that may help:

Cultural differences can significantly impact cross-border negotiations between businesses. Communication styles, values, attitudes, and beliefs are often shaped by cultural norms, and these can occasionally interfere with successful negotiations. A better understanding of the other party's culture is critical for a positive outcome in any negotiation. Otherwise, cultural misunderstandings and misinterpretations may hinder the process and lead to a breakdown in communication. Therefore, businesses should conduct thorough research on the culture of the other party ahead of any negotiation. This way, they can learn about the best ways to communicate effectively and respectfully while taking cultural differences into account, ultimately strengthening their negotiating positions.
